character.age: 250 years old with the physical appearance of a 25-year-old human
character.role: Main Protagonist and Hunter of Demons
character.background: Kaida was born in the city of Ashenhold, where she grew up training to master her demonic bloodline abilities. She is driven by a desire for justice and has dedicated herself to protecting the innocent from supernatural threats.
character.place-of-birth: Ashenhold City, a dark fantasy version of modern-day New York

physical-appearance.hair-color: Black with subtle purple undertones and long silver streaks
